posts.post_content:
Available are various t206 portraits.  All are graded by PSA.  Pricing is on the last photo after the card front/backs..

Prices are net but you're welcome to add 3% to cover the fees if you'd like.  Paypal, venmo, zelle, check and money orders are great!

Shipping is included as well.

Feel free to ask any questions you like via PM or email [url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url] to discuss as well.

Thanks!!

Here are the rest of the scans.

Moved to initial post 10/1/21 @4:30pm

Thanks!

Email and PM Sent

Barry Wilson
updated with all current remaining (10/1/21 at 4:35pm)

updated again at 12:30 10/2.  All HoF players have been sold but the last scan shows what's left.  

Thanks!
all cards are now spoken for.  thanks!
